channel.title: Error on runserver, plz help!
channel.description:
I gotten an error when i did runserver, this was the error:
port: 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 7 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn<NPCHandler.java:775> at NPCHandler.<init><NPCHandler.java:23> at server.main<server.java:27>
can anyone help me plz? i am a beginner in this.

item.title: Error on runserver, plz help!
item.dc:creator: @ipkyouhaha ipkyouhaha
item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

delete something you recently added or coded. that most likely would fix the error. if you followed a tut, follow it backwords deleting everything you added because you might have added it in the wrong spot. after you delete everything, compile and see if you get an errors (you shouldnt). then you can try following the tut again, making sure that you add everything just right.

Read full topic

item.description:

umm something to do with with npchandler and the port: 0.0.0.0:43594 is good but maybe just get someone to post there npchandler.java or if not send me a pm and i will give you mine…
